xwikidoc.name: CollectionsTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_id=id AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_title=Title AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_embeddingModel=Embedding Model AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_chunkingMethod=Chunking method AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_chunkingMethod_sectionChunking=Section-based chunking AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_chunkingMethod_maxChars=Max characters chunking AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_chunkingMaxSize=Chunking max size AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_chunkingOverlapOffset=Chunking overlap offset AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_documentSpaces=Document spaces AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_queryGroups=Groups that can query AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_editGroups=Groups that can manage content AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_adminGroups=Groups that can Manage Settings AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_rightsCheckMethod=Rights check method AI.Collections.Code.CollectionsClass_documentStore=Document Store
# External authentication AI.Collections.Code.ExternalAuthorizationConfigurationClass_url=URL of the external authorization API AI.Collections.Code.ExternalAuthorizationConfigurationClass_url.hint=On every query, a POST request with the following contents is submitted to this URL: an array document_ids of document ids as strings, a string that contains the user's name in XWiki in the form wiki:XWiki.Username, a object ldap_user with properties uid and dn if the user is connected to an LDAP account, an array jwt_users with objects with issuer and subject fields if the user is connected to one or several authorized applications, and an array oidc_users if the users is connected to one or several OpenID Connect providers. If you need to pass additional parameters like the collection name you can specify them as URL parameters.
# Sheet keys collections.sheet.description=This page controls how Collections pages are displayed in both view and edit modes. collections.sheet.noObject=The current page doesn't have the expected Collections object. collections.sheet.noFields=The Collections application doesn't have any fields to display. collections.sheet.documents=Documents collections.sheet.chunks=Indexed Chunks collections.sheet.addDocumentLabel=Add new document collections.sheet.addDocumentButton=Add Document
# Live table generic keys collections.livetable.doc.title=Page Title collections.livetable.doc.name=Page Name collections.livetable.doc.space=Space collections.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name collections.livetable.doc.location=Location collections.livetable.doc.author=Last Author collections.livetable.doc.creator=Creator collections.livetable.doc.date=Date collections.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation Date collections.livetable._avatar=Avatar collections.livetable._images=Images collections.livetable._attachments=Attachments collections.livetable._actions=Actions collections.livetable._actions.edit=Edit collections.livetable._actions.delete=Delete collections.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys collections.livetable.id=id collections.livetable.title=Title collections.livetable.embeddingModel=Embedding Model collections.livetable.chunkingMethod=Chunking method collections.livetable.chunkingMaxSize=Chunking max size collections.livetable.chunkingOverlapOffset=Chunking overlap offset collections.livetable.documentSpaces=Document spaces collections.livetable.queryGroups=Groups that can query collections.livetable.editGroups=Groups that can manage content collections.livetable.adminGroups=Groups that can Manage Settings collections.livetable.rightsCheckMethod=Rights check method collections.livetable.documentStore=Document Store
# Other keys collections.entry.name=Collections
# Deprecated keys collections.dataSpace.title=Data
